website_summaries.verdict: With a durable, easy-to-clean metal exterior, this can is tough enough to withstand the frequent use of large families or high-traffic areas.
pros: This metal frame trash can avoids the cracks and scratches common to some plastic cans, and the smooth exterior makes cleaning messes a snap
mDesign's oval design creates a wide opening for easier storage and emptying
cons: The single color option means this can may not fit the décor of some spaces

customer_reviews.title: I love that the private came into days and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that the order came in two days and I like the quality of it. What I didn’t like was that it wasn’t even wrapped in anything and there were small scratches on the bottom of the basket on each side which I feel could’ve been prevented if it was wrapped normally when you’re sending something. Nice slim design to fit in a small place and it looks much better quality than the plastic containers I’ve use there.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Pardo

customer_reviews.title: good quality. Only gripe is that the metal bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, good quality. Only gripe is that the metal bottom rings like a gong when you drop in anything hard like a plastic bottle. I think I'll glue some insulation to the bottom to dampen the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this trash can. It was exactly what I wanted. The seller did an awesome job of representing the accuracy of this product. I wanted it in my living room under the end table. Perfect, perfect, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek stylish waste can
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleek design of this! Perfect for a bathroom, fitting between the toilet and the vanity. It has a nice design on the bottom, giving it some detail. The black fit perfectly into our newly remodeled main bathroom. The waste can has soft feet on the bottom so it doesn't scratch tile or wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: iluv2garden

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this only 4 stars because of the way it was packaged. We ordered 3 which came stuck together and were hard to pull apart with damaging one at the bottom. They come wrapped in plastic which is great as protection but were suctioned together. I hope the seller notes this and fixes the issue. Otherwise, great product and super sturdy. Looks fantastic in bathroom, great match to brushed nickel accessories from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: VML

customer_reviews.title: Great design - saves my bathroom wall!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not discover this sooner? The wall by my toilet is scuffed from the kids taking out the garbage can & banging it against the wall in the process. It is a tight space so I get it - but this solves the problem! The oval design is great - I bought one for every bathroom!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape for my need.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was rather flimsy so I expected the can to be dented..... It was not. No dents and no chips. Very nice and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ESIAM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good size, oval shape fits much better than the round, also the metal container has a rounded edge and nice finish, arrived in perfect condition.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish waste can!

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but classy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice trash can. It is metal, an oblong cylinder, and would be easy to clean due to its clean lines. It's smaller than I expected (about half the size) so read the product description and check the measurements prior to purchase. That being said, it's about the perfect size for a bathroom, bedroom, or under a desk. It looks classy and serves its purpose nicely. I wish it were a few bucks cheaper, but the quality and styling are classically classy and understated, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JKR

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this black wastebasket for a guest bathroom. Although my bathroom has a traditional style, it could be used also in a transitional or even modern room. It is made of metal and is very sturdy, easy to clean, and a great value. I am happy with my purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danusha

customer_reviews.title: Heavy 100% metal
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is a little pricey, but is 100% metal, which means is sturdy. I needed a trash can fit into a tight place between the carbine and the toilet, with the oval shape, this fill the bill perfectly. To keep it from rusting, just a shot of WD40 and wipe it clean. I think this trash can will last a long long time with its timeless classy look.

product_meta.title: mDesign Slim Oval Metal Trash Can, Small Wastebasket, Garbage Receptacle Bin for Bathrooms, Powder Rooms, Kitchens, Home Offices - Bronze
feature_bullets: COMPACT DESIGN: This oval can is the perfect size for stashing inside cabinets, under desks, counters or sinks and other tight spaces. Its narrow width allows it to discreetly fit in smaller storage areas, too; It tucks nicely into the corner or next to a sink or toilet in your bathroom, it is perfect for smaller spaces, half baths and guest bathrooms

FUNCTIONAL & VERSATILE: The size and style make this can work in so many places throughout your home; Also great for college dorm rooms, apartments, condos, campers, RVs, cabins and tiny homes; The transitional design coordinates with most modern home decor and can be used in multiple rooms throughout the house
EASY TO CLEAN: Wipe clean with a damp cloth
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of strong steel with a durable rust-resistant finish
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 12" x 8.1" x 10.2" high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars300 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
